title: Wake Me Up
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B00GDOP3NQ."Yeah, she made me fall so hard that I’m still fallin’.”Emma and Aiden have an explosive meeting from the start. Emma is running from her dark past, and Aiden isn’t exactly your normal carefree student either. Emma runs halfway across the world to escape the darkness of her past and fears everything she worked so hard to bury might resurface, especially with Aiden being her flatmate. Aiden is sexy, smart, confident, and gets Emma like no one else can. He soon knows everything about her, including her darkest secrets. When Emma is forced to go home he's determined to win back the girl he lost, no matter what it takes.***Author's note: Due to strong language and sexual content, this book is not intended for readers under the age of 18.
author: Michelle Horst
